login.subTitle: Sign in to get started. Buy - Sell online.

register.subTitle: You can be a member In order to easily buy-sell Just a few steps
register.termsOfUseAndPrivacyPolicy: By registering, you agree to our terms of use and privacy policy.
register.yourAccountHasBeenVerified: Your account has been verified. You can signin now
register.yourVerificationCodeHasExpired: Your verification code has expired. Please, request a new one
register.thisRequestIsInvalid: Sorry, this request is invalid. Please, request a new verification email

resetPassword.resetPasswordTitle: Please issue an email to sign up to reset your password.
resetPassword.messgeSendEmailSuccess: We have reset the password to the email {{email}}
resetPassword.yourResetPasswordCodeHasExpired: Your reset password code has expired. Please, request a new one
resetPassword.thisRequestIsInvalid: Sorry, this request is invalid. Please, request the change of your password again

error.pleaseTryAgainLater: An error has occurred, please try again later
error.domainNotAllowed: Your are not allowed to login, please contact support@domnain.com
error.wrongEmailOrPassword: Wrong user or password. Try again or click Forgot password to reset it
error.yourEmailHasNotBeenVerified: Your email has not been verified Please click here to receive verification email
error.emailAddressAlreadyExists: This email already exists. Please, choose a different one or restore your password
error.notFoundUserByEmail: Member information could not be found from this email.
error.confirmPassword: Both password need to be the same

name: Name
resendEmailVerfyMessage: Please check your email. And click verify identity If you do not receive a confirmation email Please click here To resend
